title: Students with Consistently High Scores
description: The school wants to reward students who have scored above 80 in all subjects. They need a list of students who have consistently maintained high scores in Bangla, English, Arts, Math, and Science. Write a query to list the full names of students who have scored above 80 in all subjects.
hint:
To find those who score so high,
Combine conditions, give it a try.
Each subject checked, must meet the grade,
Join them with AND, a query made.
